title: Ireland v England: first men’s T20 cricket international – live
summary: A three-match T20 mini-series has commenced, with Rob Smyth providing an over-by-over report. The excitement builds as teams compete for victory in the first match. Stay tuned to see who will emerge victorious.

title: Donald Trump greeted by the king, William and Kate after landing in Windsor – UK politics live
summary: On his first full day of a state visit to the UK, the US president will participate in several events in Windsor. The day will culminate in a state banquet. This visit highlights the ongoing diplomatic relations between the two nations.

title: World Athletics Championships 2025: Moon retains women’s pole vault title, Cherotich wins steeplechase, Kerr goes for gold – live
summary: The latest updates from the fifth evening of events in Tokyo are being reported. Yara El-Shaboury is providing ongoing coverage of the action. Stay tuned for highlights and key moments from the evening's activities.

title: Surrey v Nottinghamshire, Sussex v Yorkshire, and more: county cricket, day three – live
summary: Live updates are being provided on matches in Division One and Two of the County Championship. The report covers key moments and progress from various grounds. Fans can follow the latest developments as the matches unfold.

title: Fired health official to testify to Senate committee about chaos in RFK Jr’s department – live
summary: Susan Monarez, who served as the director of the Centers for Disease Control, was dismissed from her position in August. The reasons for her termination have not been publicly disclosed. Her firing has raised questions about leadership stability within the agency.
